product_description: black colored travel suitcase with 56cm x 40cm x 23cm of weight capacity 22kg with 2 wheels with handle.

copy_data.primary_copy: Travel stress-free with our sleek black companion. Glides effortlessly, holds everything you need, built to last.
copy_data.headline: Your Perfect Travel Partner Awaits
copy_data.description: Spacious yet maneuverable, this modern suitcase combines style with practicality. Generous 22kg capacity means you'll never have to leave essentials behind.

claude_optimized_prompt: A sleek black hardshell suitcase with wheels positioned diagonally on polished airport terminal floor, soft natural lighting streaming through large windows, blurred travelers walking in background, modern minimalist architecture, photorealistic product photography, rule of thirds composition with copy space, 8K quality

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A sleek black hardshell suitcase positioned diagonally on a polished airport terminal floor with wheels. There is soft natural lighting streaming through large windows in the background. Blurred travelers are walking in the background, adding life to the scene, and the architecture displays a modern minimalist aesthetic. The image follows the rule of thirds composition principles with ample copy space, presented in photorealistic product photography style. The details are highly refined and rendered in 8K quality.
